Raves

For the past decade, I’ve had the good fortune to put divorced women, just like you, on the path to more happiness by aligning them with compatible partners online and in real life.

But don’t take my word for it: scroll through this page to hear what they have to say about their experience!

To learn more about the Coaching service behind each rave, click on the medallion at the top of each card.

Click These To Learn More!
Seek Sort & Select

The best gift I ever gave myself.

Online dating was such a chore until now. Coach Bernadette logs on your online dating site and in a matter of minutes can show you how to master online dating with such efficiency and spot on choices of men to email it's just amazing. This compatibility master can see what you can't when it comes to the essence of what men are really saying in profiles and emails. The mystery of how to successfully meet great guys online was finally solved. Get this online matchmaker on your site if you're ready to get off the singles market! I was on Match almost a year before I found out about Coach Bernadette's Online Dating Series. I'm finally off Match and in a relationship I would have never found on my own. Thanks Coach!

Christine L.
47 from Pennsylvania
Partner With Yourself First

If you’re single and don’t want to be…this is the real deal.

Everything Bernadette works with is authentic to you. You’ll never read about it in a self help book, find it in all the free stuff online, or hear it from your girlfriends! It’s truly amazing how this dating expert simplifies everything and it’s all about you! Brilliant and it works!

Sandy L.
52 from Connecticut
Partner With Yourself First

Once people find out what you’re doing to help single women online and off to meet quality guys that they actually want to see again, they’ll beat a path to your door.

I no longer have bad dates. In fact, I meet so many great guys, I offer them to my girlfriends! You must find out how to align with like-minded men and stop the random dating. It’s a waste of your time!

Suzanne K.
42 from New Jersey
Partner With Yourself First / Seek Sort & Select

As a graduate of Bernadette's two Signature Series, I now have a strong foundation and the confidence to go deeper with my dating experiences.

Men tell me all the time how "different" I seem to be and how open and easy it is to talk with me! Connecting with guys that see the world the way you do makes it so much easier to take things to the next level.

My dreams are coming true, and I have Coach Bernadette to thank!

Jill J.
55 from New York
Seek Sort & Select

A priceless investment!

Thanks to Bernadette's Seek, Sort, & Select Series, I was able to meet the love of my life in one month on Chemistry! Working with an expert made a huge difference.

Bobbi C.
47 from Pennsylvania
Partner With Yourself First

Dating after a divorce can be a minefield for women in midlife.

It’s not just about what to wear, where to go, who pays in this brave world of internet match-ups its getting over your reluctance to take a stab at it. It seemed so difficult for me but then I stumbled upon Compatible Connections and took advantage of a free Discovery Session. So impressed and inspired by Bernadette, I signed up on the spot for 6 Weeks! My personal experience transformed my entire life, outlook, and feeling on being single. Bernadette comes from authenticity, honesty and personal experience as a divorcee. She can help you find your new normal with your second chapter of life and love.

Marie M.
56 from New Jersey
Partner With Yourself First

I thought I tried everything already and was resigned to living my life alone.

These new ideas and savvy ways to screen men without them even 'noticing' are brilliant! I now have a million new ideas to find a companion and 'qualify' them before I leave the house. Bernadette is brilliant and original!

Brenda J.
60 from New Jersey
Partner With Yourself First

I've had the pleasure of working with Bernadette M. Smith for the past 3 months and it has been an absolute joy.

The dating skills I've learned through her Partner With Yourself Signature Series really work! Not only has my dating life improved, I also have greater awareness of who I am and what I want/need in a life partner. Bernadette's style is authentic, caring, and results-oriented - which is a breath of fresh air. I chose Bernadette as my dating expert because her techniques work instantly. She is committed to helping her clients master the crazy dating scene. I strongly believe Bernadette is a leader in the dating industry. Her skills and strategies are revolutionary, and I have personally experienced a dating transformation. I highly recommend Bernadette to anyone who is single and wants to master the inner game of dating and relationships. Since being coached by Bernadette I have transformed my entire love life! What more could I ask for?

Susan B.
44 from Pennsylvania
Partner With Yourself First

Yes, it's great the second time around!

And I owe it all to my work with Bernadette who showed me how to jump back into dating after divorce. My second chapter is self-written and speaks to exactly who I am and what I most want in a new relationship. I'm having a blast and meeting men that I would have never even noticed before! Happy again!

Martha
57 from Delaware
Partner With Yourself First

Wasn't sure if the guy I was dating was a "Keeper" for a long-term relationship/marriage.

It's always nice to have company on the weekends and chats during the work week, but what I realized while working with Bernadette is that we are NOT on the same 'relationship page.' I wanted to someday be married and he was perfectly content being a confirmed bachelor! No more wasting time and no more settling. Thanks again! NEXT!

Mandy S.
44 from New Jersey
Partner With Yourself First

Just do it!

Single isn't fun. Dating the same guy over and over isn't fun either! Get dating differently NOW! You won't be sorry. Hire this 'Dating Diva'! Your special someone is waiting for you and Bernadette can help you find him! Promise!

Nancy B.
39 from Pennsylvania
Partner With Yourself First

Your 'discoveries' were painless and tons of fun!

Never in a million years would I believe I had 'it' all the time! Plain and simple ... get to know your personality and what makes you tick so you can keep yourself out of the way while going for the man of your dreams! Yes, we all do self-sabotage and lose out on some relationships we wish we hadn't lost. Never again!

Susan
42 from New York
Partner With Yourself First

Couldn't figure out why my significant other of 2 years wouldn't have a conversation about marriage.

After only two sessions, I discovered I was with a commitment phobic! Thanks, Cupid Consultant! You saved my life!

Linda M.
55 from Delaware
Seek Sort & Select

Meeting great guys!

As soon as I began dating differently online, things started to happen. I'm really relaxed and enjoying this process of meeting like-minded men. It's such a pleasure having something to look forward to after a hard day at work! My single status was never better, and I have my choice of 'plus ones'!

Denise
44 from Florida
Partner With Yourself First

I was so prepared with my 'Connecting Questions', I met the man of my dreams at my first singles event.

It was an 'instant connection' and we are still together! I'm not sure where we are going with this relationship yet, but the ride is unbelieveable!

Anne
55 from Florida
